data.outcome_description: At 07:41 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez tidied up the room.

data.narrative: At 07:41 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez tidies up his room. He straightens the blankets on his bed, already slightly rumpled from his impromptu nap, and stacks a few books that had been lying on the floor next to his nightstand. A stray guitar pick (object_guitar_pick_01) that had been under the bed is retrieved and placed on top of the nightstand. The evening light filters through the window, casting long shadows as he works, giving the room a sense of calm.
